name: Hunting Aryn Yayger
description:
Play as Rhiner, a respected police officer tasked to hunt down a mysterious person causing giant "Titan" bugs that attack anyone who enter the forest. 

However is this the right thing to do ? We find our hero questioning his orders in this fast paced 2d platformer 

Most of the assets were my own combined and modified with some 3rd party who are credited below:

Music :Kubbi - Digestive biscuit

Tileset :https://trixelized.itch.io/starstring-fields
